Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students using a string telephone to show a way to communicate over a distance.
The student can illustrate how the string telephone uses sound to send messages between the students.
The student can demonstrate the design of the string telephone using only the materials provided.
The student can show in the drawing how communicating over a distance is achieved through the device.
The student can depict the importance of such devices in helping people communicate over long distances.
